mapper.insert: INSERT INTO st_sessionlength_section_day (year, month, day, appkey, date, dayofweek, under_three_sec, three_ten_sec, ten_thirty_sec, thirty_sixty_sec, one_three_min, three_ten_min, ten_thirty_min, over_thirty_min) VALUES (#{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{appkey}, #{date}, #{dayofweek}, #{under_three_sec,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{three_ten_sec,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ten_thirty_sec,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{thirty_sixty_sec,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{one_three_min,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{three_ten_min,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ten_thirty_min,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{over_thirty_min,jdbcType=BIGINT})

INSERT INTO st_sessionlength_section_week (year, week, appkey, fromdate, todate, under_three_sec, three_ten_sec, ten_thirty_sec, thirty_sixty_sec, one_three_min, three_ten_min, ten_thirty_min, over_thirty_min) VALUES (#{year}, #{week}, #{appkey}, #{fromdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{todate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{under_three_sec,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{three_ten_sec,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ten_thirty_sec,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{thirty_sixty_sec,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{one_three_min,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{three_ten_min,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ten_thirty_min,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{over_thirty_min,jdbcType=BIGINT})

INSERT INTO st_sessionlength_section_month (year, month, appkey, under_three_sec, three_ten_sec, ten_thirty_sec, thirty_sixty_sec, one_three_min, three_ten_min, ten_thirty_min, over_thirty_min) VALUES (#{year}, #{month}, #{appkey}, #{under_three_sec,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{three_ten_sec,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ten_thirty_sec,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{thirty_sixty_sec,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{one_three_min,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{three_ten_min,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ten_thirty_min,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{over_thirty_min,jdbcType=BIGINT})
